database.loadMetaByDate: SELECT META.ID, META.TITLE, META.DES, META.IMAGE, META.TIME, META.SOURCE_TIME, DOMAIN.DATE, DOMAIN.CATEGORY, DOMAIN.NAME FROM META, DOMAIN WHERE META.DOMAIN_ID = DOMAIN.ID AND DOMAIN.DATE LIKE '$date' ORDER BY META.ID DESC
database.loadMetaByCategory: SELECT META.ID, META.TITLE, META.DES, META.IMAGE, META.TIME, META.SOURCE_TIME, DOMAIN.DATE, DOMAIN.CATEGORY, DOMAIN.NAME FROM META, DOMAIN WHERE META.DOMAIN_ID = DOMAIN.ID AND DOMAIN.DATE LIKE '$date' AND DOMAIN.CATEGORY LIKE N'$category' ORDER BY META.ID DESC
database.loadMetaBySource: SELECT META.ID, TITLE, DES, IMAGE, TIME, SOURCE_TIME FROM META WHERE DOMAIN_ID = $domain ORDER BY ID DESC
database.loadRelation: SELECT META_ID AS META, RELATION_ID AS RELATION, "PERCENT" FROM RELATION WHERE META_ID = $id ORDER BY "PERCENT" DESC
database.loadArticle: SELECT META.ID, META.TITLE, META.DES, META.TIME, META.SOURCE_TIME, META.URL, CONTENT.CONTENT, DOMAIN.DATE, DOMAIN.CATEGORY, DOMAIN.NAME FROM META, CONTENT, DOMAIN WHERE META.ID = CONTENT.META_ID AND META.DOMAIN_ID = DOMAIN.ID AND META.ID = $id
database.loadMetaRelation: SELECT META.ID, META.TITLE, META.DES, META.IMAGE, META.TIME, DOMAIN.DATE, DOMAIN.NAME FROM META, DOMAIN WHERE META.ID = $id AND META.DOMAIN_ID = DOMAIN.ID
database.loadImage: SELECT ID, META_ID AS META, CONTENT_TYPE AS TYPE, NAME, IMAGE FROM IMAGE WHERE ID LIKE '$id'
database.loadImages: SELECT ID, META_ID AS META, CONTENT_TYPE AS TYPE, NAME, IMAGE FROM IMAGE WHERE META_ID = $id
database.loadContent: SELECT META_ID AS META, DATE, CONTENT FROM CONTENT WHERE META_ID = $id
database.search: SELECT META_ID FROM CONTENT WHERE CONTENT.CONTENT LIKE N'%$content%' ORDER BY META_ID DESC
database.loadEvent: SELECT DISTINCT META.ID FROM META, DOMAIN, RELATION WHERE DOMAIN.DATE LIKE '$date' AND DOMAIN.ID = META.DOMAIN_ID AND RELATION.META_ID = META.ID ORDER BY META.ID DESC
database.loadArticleForEvent: SELECT META.ID, META.TITLE, META.DES, META.IMAGE, META.TIME, DOMAIN.DATE, DOMAIN.CATEGORY, DOMAIN.NAME FROM META, DOMAIN WHERE META.ID = $id AND DOMAIN.ID = META.DOMAIN_ID
database.loadTopEventId: SELECT DISTINCT TOP 15 META_ID FROM RELATION ORDER BY META_ID DESC
database.loadTopEvent: SELECT ID, TITLE, IMAGE FROM META WHERE META.ID = $id
database.loadTopArticles: SELECT TOP 15 META.ID, META.TITLE, META.DES, META.IMAGE, META.TIME, DOMAIN.DATE, DOMAIN.CATEGORY, DOMAIN.NAME FROM META, DOMAIN WHERE META.DOMAIN_ID = DOMAIN.ID ORDER BY META.ID DESC
